resource_dependency.clientDataAPI: RESTful endpoint at /api/clients for fetching client data

function: Client identification functionality with search and selection capabilities
static_description: A search input field with placeholder 'Search clients...' followed by a dropdown list container that displays matching clients. Selected client is displayed in a highlighted card with client name, ID, and contact information using medium violet red text on light pink background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the search input field focuses it and shows a dropdown list when results are available
Typing in the search field triggers API call to clientSearchEndpoint and populates dropdown with results
Clicking a client from the dropdown selects that client and populates the client information card

resource_dependency.callTypesAPI: GET /api/call-types returning array of call type objects with id and name fields
resource_dependency.callTypesDataSchema: Database table 'call_types' with fields: id (UUID), name (string), description (text)

function: Call type selection dropdown or radio button component
static_description: A dropdown select element labeled 'Call Type' with options populated from callTypesAPI. Default state shows placeholder 'Select call type'. Selected value displays in medium violet red text.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the dropdown expands it to show all available call types fetched from callTypesAPI
Clicking an option selects it and collapses the dropdown, displaying the selected call type

resource_dependency.callLogsAPI: REST endpoints at /api/calls for CRUD operations on call logs
resource_dependency.callLogDataSchema: Database table 'call_logs' with fields: id (UUID), client_id (foreign key), call_type_id (foreign key), call_details (text), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp), status (enum: open, closed, todo)

function: Information recording form fields for capturing call details
static_description: A textarea field labeled 'Call Details' with placeholder 'Enter call information...' styled with medium violet red border on light pink background. Accompanied by timestamp display showing creation date.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the textarea focuses it for text input
Typing in the textarea updates the internal state with entered text

resource_dependency.actionsDataSchema: Database table 'call_actions' with fields: id (UUID), call_log_id (foreign key), action_description (text), created_at (timestamp), completed (boolean)
resource_dependency.actionsAPI: REST endpoints at /api/actions for managing call actions

function: Action step recording section for documenting actions taken during calls
static_description: A section titled 'Actions Taken' containing a list of action items (initially empty) and an input field with 'Add Action' button. Each action item displays description and completion checkbox.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Add Action' button creates new action item with text from input field
Clicking action checkbox toggles completion status of that action
Pressing Enter in action input field triggers addition of new action item

resource_dependency.followupsDataSchema: Database table 'follow_ups' with fields: id (UUID), call_log_id (foreign key), followup_description (text), due_date (date), completed (boolean)
resource_dependency.followupsAPI: REST endpoints at /api/follow-ups for managing follow-up items

function: Follow-up step recording functionality for scheduling future actions
static_description: A section titled 'Follow-up Items' with date picker input, textarea for description, and 'Add Follow-up' button. List of existing follow-ups shows description and due date.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking date picker opens calendar for date selection
Clicking 'Add Follow-up' creates new follow-up item with selected date and description
Clicking follow-up checkbox toggles completion status

resource_dependency.notesDataSchema: Database table 'call_notes' with fields: id (UUID), call_log_id (foreign key), note_content (text), created_at (timestamp)
resource_dependency.notesAPI: REST endpoints at /api/notes for managing additional notes

function: Additional information recording field for miscellaneous notes
static_description: A textarea labeled 'Additional Notes' with placeholder 'Enter any additional information...' and a save button. Textarea styled with medium violet red border.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the textarea focuses it for text input
Clicking save button persists the note content via notesAPI

resource_dependency.createCallLogAPI: POST /api/calls for creating new call logs
resource_dependency.formValidationLogic: Frontend validation ensuring all required fields are completed before submission

function: New call log creation form with all required data entry components
static_description: A form containing client selector, call type dropdown, call details textarea, actions section, follow-ups section, and additional notes textarea. Submit and cancel buttons at bottom, all styled with medium violet red on light pink background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking Submit validates all fields and sends data to createCallLogAPI if valid
Clicking Cancel clears form and returns to previous view

resource_dependency.openCallsAPI: GET /api/calls?status=open returning array of open call log objects
resource_dependency.callLogListSchema: Fields: id, client_name, call_type, created_at, last_updated

function: View open calls page displaying unresolved customer service calls
static_description: A page titled 'Open Calls' with a list of call log cards. Each card shows client name, call type, creation date, and last update time in a grid layout with medium violet red headers.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a call log card navigates to detailed view of that call log
Scrolling loads additional open call logs if pagination is implemented

resource_dependency.todoCallsAPI: GET /api/calls?status=todo returning array of to-do call log objects
resource_dependency.todoListSchema: Fields: id, client_name, call_type, due_date, priority_level

function: View to-do calls page showing pending follow-up items
static_description: A page titled 'To-Do Calls' displaying a sortable list of pending call logs. Each row shows client name, call type, due date, and priority level with medium violet red accents.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a to-do item navigates to its detailed call log view
Clicking column headers sorts the list by that field

resource_dependency.reportsAPI: GET /api/reports/call-logs for generating call log reports
resource_dependency.exportAPI: GET /api/reports/call-logs/export for exporting reports in various formats
resource_dependency.reportGenerationService: Backend service that aggregates call log data and generates report documents

function: Call log reports generation feature with export capabilities
static_description: A reports dashboard with date range selectors, filter options, and export buttons (PDF, CSV, Excel). Display area shows generated report preview with charts and summary statistics.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Generate Report' button triggers report generation via reportsAPI
Clicking export buttons downloads report in selected format via exportAPI
Changing date range or filters automatically updates report parameters

resource_dependency.clientWizardAPI: POST /api/clients for submitting new client data from wizard
resource_dependency.wizardStepsSchema: Multi-step form with steps: Basic Info, Contact Details, Additional Information
resource_dependency.wizardNavigationAPI: State management for tracking current step and form data between steps

function: Client creator wizard with multi-step form for adding new clients
static_description: A modal wizard with step indicators at top, form fields appropriate to current step in middle, and navigation buttons (Back, Next, Submit) at bottom. Progress bar shows completion status.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking Next advances to next step after validating current step data
Clicking Back returns to previous step preserving entered data
Clicking Submit on final step sends all collected data to clientWizardAPI

resource_dependency.clientUpdateAPI: PUT /api/clients/{id} for updating existing client information
resource_dependency.clientDetailsAPI: GET /api/clients/{id} for fetching current client data
resource_dependency.clientDataSchema: Database table 'clients' with fields: id (UUID), name (string), email (string), phone (string), address (text), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp)

function: Client information modification interface for updating existing client data
static_description: An editable form displaying current client information with input fields for each data point. Save and Cancel buttons at bottom, all styled with medium violet red on light pink background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking input fields enables editing of client data
Clicking Save button validates changes and sends updated data to clientUpdateAPI
Clicking Cancel discards changes and reverts to original client data from clientDetailsAPI

resource_dependency.permissionsAPI: REST endpoints at /api/users and /api/roles for managing user permissions
resource_dependency.authService: Authentication service handling user login and session management
resource_dependency.permissionsDataSchema: Database tables: users (id, username, password_hash, role_id), roles (id, name, permissions), permissions (id, name, description)

function: Permission control system for managing user access levels
static_description: User interface elements (buttons, menu items, data fields) that are conditionally visible or enabled based on user role. Admin users see additional configuration options in medium violet red.

interaction_and_states.description: Page load checks user permissions via permissionsAPI and renders UI elements accordingly
Authentication state changes trigger re-evaluation of accessible features

resource_dependency.frontendFramework: React.js application structure with component hierarchy
resource_dependency.stylingResources: CSS modules with light pink background (#FFB6C1) and medium violet red (#C71585) color scheme
resource_dependency.dataFetchingLibrary: Axios or Fetch API for making HTTP requests to backend

function: A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
static_description: Single-page application with navigation menu, main content area, and footer. All pages use light pink background with medium violet red text and borders. Components fetch data dynamically from backend APIs.

interaction_and_states.description: Route changes trigger data fetching from appropriate backend endpoints
Page refresh maintains current state and refetches displayed data

resource_dependency.postgresqlConnection: PostgreSQL database connection using environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp
resource_dependency.databaseSchema: Complete schema including tables: clients, call_types, call_logs, call_actions, follow_ups, call_notes, users, roles, permissions
resource_dependency.apiFramework: Node.js/Express REST API framework with PostgreSQL integration

function: A backend API layer connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
static_description: RESTful API server with endpoints for clients, calls, actions, follow-ups, notes, and reports. Server connects to PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables for configuration.

interaction_and_states.description: Incoming HTTP requests are routed to appropriate handlers which query PostgreSQL database using configured connection
Connection failures or query errors return appropriate HTTP error responses
